_description: Configuration for CA-only protein sequence design

_parameter_descriptions.chains: Space-separated chain IDs to design using CA coordinates only
_parameter_descriptions.num_sequences: Number of sequences to generate from backbone trace
_parameter_descriptions.temperature: Sampling temperature (CA models may need slightly higher values)
_parameter_descriptions.model: CA-ProteinMPNN model version (only v_48_002, v_48_010, v_48_020 available)

_model_specific.note: CA models do not have v_48_030 version, and soluble variants are not available

standard_ca_design.description: Standard CA-only design for protein complex

use_cases: Cases where side chain information is unreliable
limitations: Less side chain context than full-atom models
May miss some side chain-dependent interactions

_input_requirements.pdb_format: Standard PDB format (full-atom or CA-only both work)
_input_requirements.coordinate_usage: Only CA (carbon alpha) coordinates are used, others ignored
_input_requirements.chain_handling: Specify chains that have valid CA coordinates
_input_requirements.preprocessing: No special preprocessing required - model extracts CA coordinates automatically
